ISSUE.TITLE: Can't delete Multicurrency Rate (BLOCKING!)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug i have enabled the multicurrency module and have added the rates for Euro, i can modify but i can't delete the Rate completely when clicking on Delete! i have not used this currency anywhere its a clean database! ### Dolibarr Version 19.0.3 ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior 1- Activate the multicurrency module 2- add a rate to a currency of your choice 3- try do delete the rate ### Attached files
